alert.note: Alert for Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 1:55AM MST until January 22 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes Interstate 25 over Raton Pass, State Road 72 from Raton to Folsom, and U.S. Highway 87 from Raton to Capulin.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving.

area.areaDesc: Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass
